description: Try our easy to follow Homemade Ginger Beer recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Homemade Ginger Beer Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine 1.25l boiling water, sugar, lemon juice, ginger and yeast in a large pot. Cover loosely with plastic wrap. Leave overnight at room temperature.
Use a slotted spoon to skim off foam from surface, if necessary. Transfer to clean plastic bottles, discarding any sediment in the bottom, leaving a 4cm gap at the top of each bottle. Seal and chill.
